name: dereuromark/cakephp-decimal
description: CakePHP plugin for decimal handling via value object. Provides DecimalType class.

scripts.stan-setup: cp composer.json composer.backup && composer require --dev phpstan/phpstan:^2.0.0 && mv composer.backup composer.json
scripts.lowest-setup: composer update --prefer-lowest --prefer-stable --prefer-dist --no-interaction && cp composer.json composer.backup && composer require --dev dereuromark/composer-prefer-lowest && mv composer.backup composer.json
